column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya is a favorite of mine for ramen
column2: but be warned that the wait times can be over 30 minutes on a popular night. The atmosphere is very laid-back and charming. I always get the spicy chicken ramen when I come here (spice level spicy
column3: then I add more hot sauce accordingly). Interestingly enough
column4: I don't care for the actual chicken in the bowl
column5: as it can be a little bland alongside the broth
column6: but the broth itself is very flavorful and seasoned well. There is also not an overwhelming amount of salt
column7: which I am happy about. Overall
